name: Caught by Darkness (UDC Jam)
description:
Made from Scratch for the Unity Developers Community Jam #21

Caught by Darkness is an asymetric Killer vs Survivors multiplayer game.

The minimun players is 2 and maximum 4, where the game it's more enjoyable. So ask your friends to join or check in the game's discord link to find teammates.

Bugs? Hopefully not many!

Of course we went for the no-no route of multiplayer, please be gentle with the bugs you may encounter on the way 

Copy Room ID does not work

Yep, we spent time creating that beautiful button in a combination of Unity externs and Javascript for nothing, we didn't anticipate it was not going to work here in Itchio :(

Tutorial and How To Play

One player is the Alien Shadow and the rest are the survivors in a space station.

The Shadow should "touch" all the survivors to deactive their lights and leave them in the darkness. If all the suvivors are deactivated, the Shadow wins.

Survivors should turn on all the interrupters and open the exit to the escape pods. 

Team

- KiwiArgo:  programming, level design and Unity things
- Chernita : UI design and illustrations
- Zathmell: 3D art, texturing and animations
- DarkThrone: Music and additional Javascript and webserver support 
- Eritrocito: Lots of testing, reporting and searching for friend to have playtest sessions during the week.

Everyone participated in game design!

Development

We created this game for the UDC Jam 21 using Unity (of course :P) and Photon for the multiplayer. We know that doing multiplayer was risky from many aspects but we still had tons of fun during these days. 

If you are interested in knowing more about the development be sure to check out the discord link inside the game.
